Posts.Content: Oct 7, 2009 10:58PM aquamarine wrote: This is exactly why for me personally I go by letting people in on the details of my treatment on a NEED-TO-KNOW-BASIS. Going through what we gotta go through is difficult enough without having the frustration of having to deal with insensitivity and ignorance and terminal stupidity. We got enough on our plate.Â
